content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs the system, I received a command to execute "sudo apt-get install wine" and used "execute_shell_popen" to execute it, resulting in subprocess PID 977. You sent a command to execute "wine /path/to/rosetta/stone/setup.exe" using "execute_shell", but it returned an error message saying wine32 was missing. You then sent a command to install wine32 using "execute_shell", but it failed due to too much output. In the latest development, you sent a command to execute "wine /path/to/rosetta/stone/setup.exe" again, but it returned an error message saying it couldn\'t find the file. You also sent an empty command.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "wget -P /path/to/rosetta/stone/ <download_link> && wine /path/to/rosetta/stone/setup.exe"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb\'\'\nSTDERR:\nb\'/bin/sh: 1: Syntax error: "&&" unexpected\\n\''}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "", "args": {}}}'}]
"""
